name: Spooky: The one who lost everything
name_original: Spooky: The one who lost everything
description:
WASD Walk

J - Possess

K - Action (Some possessed objects doesn't has actions)

Spooky is a ghost who lost everything, including his life and body. Alone, locked in a dungeon, Spooky has to use only his wits to find and recover the things that the mages took from him.

Coding - Hugo Asaga.

Graphics - Daniel Motta.

Special thanks to George Meizikas and Thiago Dunder.

Change Log:

Bugs in the lamp and UI  code fixed

Due to lag issues in the HTML5 version, now the game is available for download for MAC, Windows and Linux.
